main event: A civilian in Bedford, Indiana observed a round flashing object the size of a baseball for several minutes, appearing to be stationary for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round, flashing red, green, and blue.
The observation lasted for several minutes, with the object appearing to be stationary for 20 minutes.
The conclusion was that the object was likely a star due to the description, duration, and flight path.
No photographs were included in the report.
The case was listed as insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: round flashing object the size of a baseball
